posts.text: var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-XxngLXhl"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "智绘里的声音", author: "智绘里", url: "智绘里.mp3", pic: "/852bd570-2a30-11e9-b051-e96439792bd2/1.png", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); p.s 用这种方法写文章然后投稿太慢啦！得想一个新办法！To see her fascinated MV
